description.zh-cn: 中国电影表演艺术家。2005年被中国电影表演艺术学会评为中国电影百年百位优秀演员之一。
description.en: A Chinese film performing artist. In 2005, he was named one of the 100 Excellent Actors in 100 Years of Chinese Cinema by the China Film Performance Art Academy.

description.zh-cn: 中国直辖市，魏鹤龄的出生地。
description.en: A municipality in China, the birthplace of Wei Heling.

nodes.id: 中国电影表演艺术学会

zh-cn: 中国电影表演艺术学会

description.zh-cn: 中国的一个专业组织，于2005年评选了“中国电影百年百位优秀演员”，魏鹤龄名列其中。
description.en: A professional organization in China that selected the '100 Excellent Actors in 100 Years of Chinese Cinema' in 2005, including Wei Heling.

nodes.id: 中国电影百年百位优秀演员

zh-cn: 中国电影百年百位优秀演员
en: 100 Excellent Actors in 100 Years of Chinese Cinema

description.zh-cn: 由中国电影表演艺术学会于2005年为纪念中国电影诞生百年而评选的荣誉称号名单。
description.en: An honorary title list selected by the China Film Performance Art Academy in 2005 to commemorate the centenary of Chinese cinema.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国戏剧家组成的全国性人民团体，魏鹤龄是其会员。
description.en: A national-level people's organization composed of dramatists in the People's Republic of China, of which Wei Heling was a member.

description.zh-cn: 中华人民共和国电影家组成的全国性人民团体，魏鹤龄是其会员。
description.en: A national-level people's organization composed of filmmakers in the People's Republic of China, of which Wei Heling was a member.

nodes.id: 中华全国戏剧工作者协会

zh-cn: 中华全国戏剧工作者协会

description.zh-cn: 中国戏剧家协会的前身，魏鹤龄曾是其第一届全国委员会的成员。
description.en: The predecessor of the China Theatre Association, of which Wei Heling was a member of its first national committee.
Wei Heling was a native of Tianjin.

relationships.source: 中国电影表演艺术学会

description.zh-cn: 2005年，中国电影表演艺术学会将魏鹤龄评为“中国电影百年百位优秀演员”之一。
description.en: In 2005, the China Film Performance Art Academy named Wei Heling as one of the '100 Excellent Actors in 100 Years of Chinese Cinema'.

description.zh-cn: 魏鹤龄是中国戏剧家协会会员。
description.en: Wei Heling was a member of the China Theatre Association.

description.zh-cn: 魏鹤龄是中国电影家协会会员。
description.en: Wei Heling was a member of the China Film Association.

relationships.target: 中华全国戏剧工作者协会

position.zh-cn: 第一届全国委员会委员

description.zh-cn: 魏鹤龄是中华全国戏剧工作者协会第一届全国委员会的成员。
description.en: Wei Heling was a member of the first national committee of the All-China Association of Drama Workers.
